name: Food And Drink 47 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the top selling Kool Aid flavor?

In what country did the turnip originate?
Broccoli is the only vegetable that is a flower?
Whose slogan was 'just for the taste of it'?
What is called the 'black sheep' of Canadian liquors?

What famous European brand beer uses a red star as part of its logo?
